name: Break the Ice (Ikercorian, Rainbow9tails, Nicole Stocks, ReidHarry, replacers, Vendolak)
name_original: Break the Ice (Ikercorian, Rainbow9tails, Nicole Stocks, ReidHarry, replacers, Vendolak)
description:
Break The Ice is 2D pixel art game where you play as a polar bear trying to avoid the sun's harmful rays. Dodge fireballs that melt your iceberg in order to stay afloat as long as you can!

Break the Ice was created in a team of five over a 48-hour period for a game jam hosted by Michigan State University's official game development club, Spartasoft. The theme of the game jam was "heat". 

CREDITS

Deenie Vichitpap: Programmer

Ashley Jarria: 2D Character Artist

Ian Kercorian: 2D VFX Artist, 2D Character Artist 

Kalea Vendola: 2D Character Artist

Rachel Tiv: 2D Environment Artist

We also would like to give our thanks to Adam Grisdale for the audio in the project, Nicole Stocks for the title screen, and Reid Harry for programming the sun!
